name: Laid-Back Camp All-in-one!!
summary:
Familiar characters like Nadeshiko Kagamihara, Rin Shima, Chiaki Ōgaki, Aoi Inuyama, and Ena Saitō engage in dynamic and fully-voiced dialogues. Moreover, the game is packed with over 1,000 types of camping gear and vehicles, mouth-watering camp meals, and beautiful sceneries from locations centered around Yamanashi, Nagano, and Shizuoka, bringing you the world of "Laid-Back Camp".

Why don't you come and watch everyone you know camping?
